statements: SELECT * FROM equipment_failure_prediction;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment_failure_prediction WHERE condition_status = 'Good';
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM equipment_failure_prediction ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_failure_prediction WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-11-01';
SELECT equipment_id, condition_status FROM equipment_failure_prediction WHERE next_maintenance_due_date <= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM equipment_failure_prediction WHERE condition_status = 'Critical';
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment_failure_prediction ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, next_maintenance_due_date FROM equipment_failure_prediction WHERE next_maintenance_due_date < NOW();
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM equipment_failure_prediction WHERE last_maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM equipment_failure_prediction WHERE condition_status = 'Critical' OR condition_status = 'Serious' ORDER BY equipment_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_data;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, maintenance_cost FROM equipment_data WHERE equipment_type = 'Printer';
SELECT maintenance_cost, equipment_name FROM equipment_data ORDER BY maintenance_cost DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, maintenance_date FROM equipment_data WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_notes FROM equipment_data WHERE maintenance_notes IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM equipment_data WHERE maintenance_cost > 1000 ORDER BY equipment_name ASC
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, maintenance_cost FROM equipment_data WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, maintenance_date FROM equipment_data WHERE equipment_type = 'Printer'
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date, maintenance_cost FROM equipment_data WHERE maintenance_cost < 500 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT * FROM maintenance_log WHERE issue_description LIKE '%fault%'
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, location, last_maintenance_date FROM Equipment ORDER BY equipment_id DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_type FROM Equipment e JOIN MaintenanceRecords m ON e.equipment_id = m.equipment_id WHERE e.location = 'Warehouse';

SELECT e.equipment_name, m.technician_name, h.health_status FROM Equipment e INNER JOIN MaintenanceRecords m ON e.equipment_id = m.equipment_id INNER JOIN EquipmentHealth h ON e.equipment_id = h.equipment_id WHERE h.prediction_score > 0.8;

SELECT e.equipment_name, COUNT(m.record_id) AS maintenance_count FROM Equipment e LEFT JOIN MaintenanceRecords m ON e.equipment_id = m.equipment_id GROUP BY e.equipment_name HAVING maintenance_count > 5 ORDER BY maintenance_count DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM Equipment
SELECT maintenance_type, technician_name, maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceRecords
SELECT * FROM EquipmentHealth WHERE health_status = 'good'
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, location, last_maintenance_date FROM Equipment ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC
SELECT Equipment.equipment_id, Equipment.equipment_name, EquipmentHealth.health_status FROM Equipment INNER JOIN EquipmentHealth ON Equipment.equipment_id = EquipmentHealth.equipment_id
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT name, type FROM Equipment WHERE installation_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_name, value FROM SensorData ORDER BY reading_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE description LIKE '%fault%';
SELECT equipment_id, prediction, confidence_level FROM PredictiveAnalysis WHERE analysis_date > '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM Equipment WHERE type = 'Sensor';
SELECT equipment_id, name, installation_date FROM Equipment ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, name, type, installation_date FROM Equipment WHERE name LIKE 'A%' AND type = 'Temperature';
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_name FROM SensorData WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY reading_time ASC;
SELECT equipment_id, prediction, confidence_level FROM PredictiveAnalysis WHERE confidence_level >= 0.8;
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, status FROM Equipment WHERE status='Active';
SELECT equipment_id, installation_date FROM Equipment WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM SensorData ORDER BY reading_time DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM SensorData GROUP BY equipment_id;
SELECT * FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_name = 'Air Conditioner'
SELECT equipment_name, installation_date FROM Equipment WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY installation_date DESC
SELECT equipment_name, status, maintenance_due_date FROM Equipment WHERE installation_date < '2023-01-01' AND status = 'Inactive'
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date, technician FROM MaintenanceRecords WHERE technician = 'John Doe' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY reading_time
